import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from "yup"; function PersonalInfoSection(props) { const [openAditionalInfo, setOpenAditionalInfo] = useState(false); const formSchema = Yup.object().shape({ first_name: Yup.string() .required("This field is required!"), last_name: Yup.string() .required("This field is required!"), email: Yup.string() .email("Invalid email!") .required("This field is required!"), phone: Yup.string() .required("This field is required!") }) function handleSubmit(values) { props.changeState(2); changePersonalInfo(values); const { first_name, email } = values; console.log(first_name + " " + email) } return (
{/*
*/} { handleSubmit(values); }} validationSchema={formSchema}> {props => (
{props.errors.first_name && props.touched.first_name &&

{props.errors.first_name}

}
{props.errors.last_name && props.touched.last_name &&

{props.errors.last_name}

}
{props.errors.email && props.touched.email &&

{props.errors.email}

}
{props.errors.phone && props.touched.phone &&

{props.errors.phone}

}
setOpenAditionalInfo(!openAditionalInfo)}> Additional information
)}
) } export default PersonalInfoSection
